description: Mythtv frontend control interface. A network remote control for MythTV. MythMote controls MythTV frontends. Control is obtained through the frontend's raw text-based TCP socket interface. NOTE: You MUST have a functional MythTV setup and mythfrontend network remote control enabled. Features: * Manage multiple frontends * Basic navigation and media control * Keyboard input passthrough to frontend * Wake-On-LAN * Customizable Keybindings * Supports small and large screen devices
